title: VerifyNet: Secure and Verifiable Federated Learning
summaries: in the conventional FL framework, __[1] propose a double-masking protocol__ to guarantee confidential of local models, and __[2] add verification of the integrity of the aggregated results from the server__ by requiring cloud server to provide the Proof about the correctness of the aggregated results
